content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":1,"originalJapaneseLine":"最後に言えた言葉はたったそれだけ。","translatedEnglishLine":"The only words spoken at the end were just those."},{"lineNumber":2,"originalJapaneseLine":"互いの体が発光し、","translatedEnglishLine":"Their bodies began to glow,"},{"lineNumber":3,"originalJapaneseLine":"互いの顔から表情が消え、","translatedEnglishLine":"The expressions vanished from their faces,"},{"lineNumber":4,"originalJapaneseLine":"互いの体が近づく。","translatedEnglishLine":"Their bodies moved closer to each other."},{"lineNumber":5,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして――","translatedEnglishLine":"And then—"},{"lineNumber":6,"originalJapaneseLine":"サイゼルはいない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Saizel was gone."},{"lineNumber":7,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルはいない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hauzel was gone."},{"lineNumber":8,"originalJapaneseLine":"サイゼルはいる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Saizel existed."},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルはいる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hauzel existed."},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人は、一人に。","translatedEnglishLine":"The two became one."},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"無の存在に。","translatedEnglishLine":"They became an existence of nothingness."},{"lineNumber":12,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、破壊の象徴に……","translatedEnglishLine":"And then, a symbol of destruction..."},{"lineNumber":13,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":14,"originalJapaneseLine":"破壊の神、ラ・バスワルドが、","translatedEnglishLine":"The god of destruction, La Baswald,"},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"この世界に初めて顕現した。","translatedEnglishLine":"manifested in this world for the first time."},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにあったのは、破壊。","translatedEnglishLine":"What was there was destruction."},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"粉々に踏み潰されたような破壊とも違う。","translatedEnglishLine":"Not destruction as if something were smashed to pieces."},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"建物や地面が丸くえぐり取られている。","translatedEnglishLine":"Buildings and the ground were gouged out in round shapes."},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"空間が削られたような破壊だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was destruction as if space itself had been shaved away."},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いったい、なにがあったら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What on earth must have happened,"},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんなことになるんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"to cause something like this?\""},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう……ひどい、ですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... it's terrible, isn't it...\""},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"その村にたまたま来ていたのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"By chance, the ones who came to that village were,"},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスと、その奴隷のシィルだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and his slave, Shiru."},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんだか嫌な予感がしますよ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I've got a bad feeling about this, you know?"},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"　離れませんか、ランス様？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Shouldn't we leave, Master Rance?\""},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーむ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm..."},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それもそうだなぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I guess you're right."},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、そこにいるのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, isn't that over there,"},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス君とシィルちゃんじゃない」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance-kun and Shiru-chan?\""},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、この……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-this..."},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ねっとりと絡みつく優しい声は」","translatedEnglishLine":"That sticky, clinging gentle voice is..."},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アムちゃんか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Amu-chan!?\""},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"「正解。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Correct."},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"　覚えていてくれたなんて、","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm so happy that you remembered me."},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とっても嬉しいわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's really wonderful.\""},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"「声はすれども姿は見えず……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I hear your voice, but I can't see you..."},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どこにいるんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Where are you?\""},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス君、足下、足下」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance-kun, under your feet, under your feet."},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……足下？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Under my feet?\""},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃああああああああ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaaaaaaa!"},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ら、ランス様！　アムさんが……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"M-Master Rance! Amu-san is...!\""},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわっ、気持ちわるっ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, that's disgusting!"},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アムちゃん、なんだその格好！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Amu-chan, what's with that appearance!?\""},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"地面に這いつくばったアムが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Amu was crawling on the ground,"},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"両手をよちよちと使って近づいてきていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"using both hands awkwardly to approach."},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼女には下半身がなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"She had no lower body."},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやー、死ぬかと思ったわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, I thought I was going to die.\""},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むしろ、なんで死んでないんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rather, why are you still alive?\""},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"「見る？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do you want to see?"},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"　下腹部から下がないんだけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't have anything below my lower abdomen...\""},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなもん見せんでいい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No need to show me that!\""},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ……アムちゃんだからな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well... it's Amu-chan... if her lower body is gone, it doesn't mean she's dead.\""},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"　下半身がないくらいなら死なんか」","translatedEnglishLine":"If her lower body is gone, that alone doesn't mean death.\""},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、何があったんだ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, what happened?\""},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"　村も滅茶苦茶になってるが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"The village is a complete mess too..."},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この村はね、私の作った村なの」","translatedEnglishLine":"This village is one I created."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後に言えた言葉はたったそれだけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only words spoken at the end were just those.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 互いの顔から表情が消え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The expressions vanished from their faces,
Their bodies moved closer to each other.
They became an existence of nothingness.
And then, a symbol of destruction...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 破壊の神、ラ・バスワルドが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The god of destruction, La Baswald,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界に初めて顕現した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: manifested in this world for the first time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにあったのは、破壊。
粉々に踏み潰されたような破壊とも違う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not destruction as if something were smashed to pieces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 建物や地面が丸くえぐり取られている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Buildings and the ground were gouged out in round shapes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空間が削られたような破壊だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was destruction as if space itself had been shaved away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなことになるんだ？」
その村にたまたま来ていたのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By chance, the ones who came to that village were,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと、その奴隷のシィルだった。
「な、なんだか嫌な予感がしますよ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I've got a bad feeling about this, you know?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 離れませんか、ランス様？」
ランス君とシィルちゃんじゃない」
ねっとりと絡みつく優しい声は」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That sticky, clinging gentle voice is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 覚えていてくれたなんて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm so happy that you remembered me.
"I hear your voice, but I can't see you...
Rance-kun, under your feet, under your feet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ら、ランス様！　アムさんが……！」
アムちゃん、なんだその格好！？」
地面に這いつくばったアムが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amu was crawling on the ground,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両手をよちよちと使って近づいてきていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: using both hands awkwardly to approach.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女には下半身がなかった。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I thought I was going to die."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むしろ、なんで死んでないんだ」
下腹部から下がないんだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't have anything below my lower abdomen..."
"Well... it's Amu-chan... if her lower body is gone, it doesn't mean she's dead."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 下半身がないくらいなら死なんか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If her lower body is gone, that alone doesn't mean death."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村も滅茶苦茶になってるが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The village is a complete mess too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この村はね、私の作った村なの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This village is one I created.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
